name: Distant Worlds: Return of the Shakturi
name_original: Distant Worlds: Return of the Shakturi
description:
Distant Worlds: Return of the Shakturi is a strategy game developed by Code Force. It was originally released in 2010. Matrix Games published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Distant Worlds: Return of the Shakturi on PC.
